metadata.title: CVE-2020-6817 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
[Regular expression denial of service]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-6817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bleach - 3.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-1').
